alert.note: Alert for Humboldt County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 2:30PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Humboldt and north central Lander Counties through 300 PM PDT... At 230 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles southwest of Battle Mountain, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Phoenix Mine and Trenton Canyon Mine. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Humboldt County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County
